scripts.build:elements: ng build --project elements --output-hashing none && npm run pack:elements && cp dist/elements/mor-elements.js projects/elements/src/integration/ && cp dist/elements/styles.css projects/elements/src/integration/mor-elements.css && cp dist/elements/{es,at,be,gb,bg,hr,cy,cz,hu,de,fr,dk,ie,lt,mt,fi,gr,it,ee,lu,lv,pt,sk,nl,pl,ro,si,se}.svg projects/elements/src/integration/
scripts.pack:elements: cat ./dist/elements/{runtime,polyfills,main,scripts}.js > dist/elements/mor-elements.js && ls -lah dist/elements/mor-elements.js && ls -lah dist/elements/styles.css
scripts.build-serve:elements: npm run build:elements && npm run serve:elements
scripts.build:gh-pages: ng build --output-path ../docs/ --base-href /MOR/ && npm run build:elements && cp -r ./projects/elements/src/integration ../docs/integration
